import React from 'react'; import './sidebar.css'; import User from '../../user/user'; import { AiFillHome, AiFillHeart } from 'react-icons/ai'; import { NavLink, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaBroadcastTower } from 'react-icons/fa'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import { IoLogOutOutline } from 'react-icons/io5'; import { IoMdCloseCircle } from 'react-icons/io'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import * as actions from '../../../store/action/getData'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; const Sidebar = props => { const chooseTheme = (event) => { console.log(event) } const chooseLanguage = (event) => { console.log(event) } const classes = props.isAsideShow ? ['sidebar_menu', 'show'] : ['sidebar_menu']; const classesBtn = props.isAsideShow ? ['closeBtn', 'btn', 'show'] : ['closeBtn', 'btn']; const closeAsideByClass = (e) => { if(e.target.className === 'sidebar') { props.closeAside(); } }; return (
closeAsideByClass(e)}>

) } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ isAsideShow: state.isAsideShow }); const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ closeAside: () => dispatch(actions.closeAside()), openAside: () => dispatch(actions.openAside()), }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Sidebar);
